ComicInfo.Summary: The most legendary name in alternative music comes to comics! For decades CBGB was the club that broke acts -- like The Ramones, Blondie, Misfits & Talking Heads -- that changed the world! Now BOOM! Town brings comics’ best talent to tell stories of love, music, heartbreak, confusion and rebellion! In this issue, Ana Matronic of the Grammy-nominated band SCISSOR SISTERS makes her comic book creator debut! While KILL AUDIO and SUPERTRON madman Sheldon Vella brings his talents to the stage! Cover by Eisner-award winner Chuck BB!
